amendment.description: To require a joint family support assistance program for families of members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4386 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4386 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6354) To require a joint family support assistance program for families of members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4386 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Allard.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4386 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
